mapper.select: select count(1) from t_book where type=#{type} order by name

SELECT COUNT(b.id) AS bookcount, b.id,bk.id AS bookid,tp.typetext,bk.name,bk.author FROM t_borrow b LEFT JOIN t_book bk ON b.`bookid`=bk.`id` LEFT JOIN t_type tp ON bk.type=tp.type GROUP BY b.bookid ORDER BY COUNT(b.id) DESC limit #{page},#{pagesize}
